Modifies the time point by the given duration.

@1@ Applies the offset {{c|d}} to {{tt|pt}}. Effectively, {{c|d}} is added to the internally stored duration {{tti|d_}} as {{c|1=d_ += d}}.

@2@ Applies the offset {{c|d}} to {{tt|pt}} in negative direction. Effectively, {{c|d}} is subtracted from internally stored duration {{tti|d_}} as {{c|1=d_ -= d}}.
